additionalRemarks._instruction: Enter any additional remarks concerning this specimen set.

biologicalSex._instruction: Add the biological sex of all specimen in this set.

internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier (or label) of this specimen set that is used within the corresponding data files to identify this specimen set.

lookupLabel._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this specimen set that may help you to find this instance more easily.

species._instruction: Add the species and/or strain (a sub-type of a genetic variant of species) of all specimen in this set.
